nodes.bodyText: IIUC this is just an optimization to avoid attempting to search for CRLF? is this thought to be common?

Can not say it's common, because usually TCP packet includes enough data for the start-line. This is to prevent going inside handlePartialInitialLine when CRLF was not found. Let me move it inside the if statement.
Actually, I don't think we need it. Let me kill it :)
